name: Two-Fisted
description: Your character is well-versed in fighting with a weapon in each hand.
effect: Ignore the MAP when attacking with one weapon in each hand

name: Ambidextrous
description: Your character has dextrous use of both hands interchangably
effect: Ignore the off-hand penalty when making actions with your 'off hand'.

name: Quick
description: Your character is always ready to go
effect: Discard any action card with a value less than five

name: Level Headed
description: Your character is old hat in combat and can often see the best course of action before his comrades.
effect: Draw two action cards per round of combat and act on the better of the two

name: Improved Level Headed
description: Your character is a master combatant
effect: Draw three action cards per round of combat and act on the best one

name: Tactician
description: Your character is a leader of men and calls out instructions that all can hear.
effect: At the start of each round, you get two cards which you can give to allies and extras under your control

name: Battle Master
description: Your character is among the best tacticians around.
effect: At the start of each round, you get three cards which you can give to allies and extras under your control
